remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个特定于 HTTP 的异常类，使 ASP.NET 可以生成异常信息。The class is an HTTP-specific exception class that enables ASP.NET to generate exception information. 有关引发和处理异常的详细信息，请参阅[异常](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md)。For more information about throwing and handling exceptions, see [Exceptions](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来引发自定义的异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to raise customized exceptions. `Button_Click`方法确定哪个按钮被单击，然后调用任一`CheckNumber`或`CheckBoolean`方法。The `Button_Click` method determines which button was clicked, and then calls either the `CheckNumber` or `CheckBoolean` method. 如果在文本框中的用户输入值与预期的类型，不对应异常会创建和引发的错误类型的自定义消息。If the user-entered value in the text box does not correspond to the expected type, an exception is created and thrown with a customized message based on the error type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理异常时，它可用于捕获一系列与外部对内部异常的响应所引发的异常相关的异常。When handling exceptions, it can be useful to capture a series of related exceptions with the outer exception being thrown in response to an inner exception. 对导致外部异常的内部异常的引用是可从外部异常的属性。A reference to the inner exception that caused the outer exception is available from the property of the outer exception. 此机制将保留早期异常，包括原始异常，同时允许您创建更有意义的外部异常携带的错误信息。This mechanism preserves the error information that is carried by earlier exceptions, including the original exceptions, while allowing you to create more meaningful outer exceptions. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的构造函数类。The following code example demonstrates the constructor of the class. `CheckNumber`方法接受用户输入的值，通过文本框中，并检查它是否为整数。The `CheckNumber` method accepts a user-entered value through a text box and checks whether it is an integer. 如果值不是一个整数，将引发异常，和一个新对象会创建和引发。If the value is not an integer, an exception is thrown, and then a new object is created and thrown. 中捕获到异常`Button_Click`事件处理程序和错误消息显示在浏览器上。That exception is caught in the `Button_Click` event handler and the error message is displayed on the browser. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
